tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: i met with an accident and had to undergo ACL reconstruction and Dr Venugopal sir was the best in the field. he first gave me a confidence about the surgery and the recovery. he explained what exactly is needed step by step. post surgery care I was walking within 2 days after surgery. one of the best doctor. thank you sir

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I know the doctor from last 17years and I have been consulting him for any orthopaedic related problems. He diagnosise the problem patiently and provides realistic treatment, avoids unnecessary tests and therapies. He is a trust worthy doctor. He treats patients with care and respect.
Excellent analysis and very clear explanation and instructions for treatment, prescribes the right approach for therapy.

Doctor was good and kind. 

Staff were rude. They didn’t agree on rate shown in Practo App. Also asked for additional registration fee

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: ** ** * **** **** ****** doesn’t write unnecessary xrays diagnoses the problem and gives ****** treatment very happy patient can recommend
